overview.name: Countries Allowing platform
overview.description: I have found that the leading countries using the platform tiktok are china, US and russia, growth of the app steadily inclines as more age groups begin to download the platform, to surpass Snapchat users in late 2020, 64 million to 698 million from 2018-2020 users

overview.name: Countries Allowing: U.S
overview.description: March of 2021, 64% of users are female and 39% male

overview.name: Countries Allowing: India
overview.description: India had an immediate user growth since 2017(then considered "Musically") until the recent December 2020 ban.

overview.name: Countries Allowing: China
overview.description: over 65% of internet users actively use tiktok

overview.name: Countries Allowing: Germany
overview.description: second biggest western european market

overview.name: Demographic Range 10-19
overview.description: 25% of downloads as of March of 2021

overview.name: Demographic Range 20-29
overview.description: 22.4% of downloads as of March of 2021

overview.name: Demographic Range 30-39
overview.description: 21.7% of downloads as of March of 2021

overview.name: Demographic Range 40-49
overview.description: 20.3% of downloads as of March of 2021

overview.name: Demographic Range 50+
overview.description: 11% of downlaods as of March of 2021

overview.name: Origins: China
overview.description: ByteDance was created on March 9, 2012

overview.name: Origins: Caymen Islands
overview.description: This was where Bytedance got legally domiciled

overview.name: Origins: Shanghai, China
overview.description: Novemeber 9th 2017, ByteDance bought musically

overview.name: Origins: China
overview.description: 2018 Bytedance got rid of Musically in hopes to transition it to TikTok

overview.name: Origins: China
overview.description: December 2017 TikTok was launched in only China. Creator of Tiktok was Zhang Yiming

overview.name: TikTok CEO
overview.description: Kevin Mayer was the first CEO of TIkTok along with creator Zhang Yiming he left on August 26, 2020

overview.name: New TikTok CEO
overview.description: Vanessa Pappas became the CEO of TikTok after Mayer

overview.name: Launch
overview.description: Launched on the international market on September 2018.

overview.name: Reach
overview.description: Became the most downloaded app globally in 2020. Now 1.1 billion users worldwide.

overview.name: Global Employees
overview.description: TikTok has a lot of employees globally and continue to employ more each year.

overview.name: US Employees
overview.description: According to Axios, there are currently 1400 employees working in the U.S. however there are plans to hrire 10,000 more employees within the next year,

overview.name: Layoffs
overview.description: According to multiple reports, TikTok has laid off an undisclosed number of employees in India due to recent legislation.

overview.name: North American Offices
overview.description: Internationally, Tiktok has offices in many countries according to its website - making it a true global phenomenon.
